Detailed Description

msg.h: A Message Block (MSG) is a fundamental microkernel structure for the message passing mechanism.

This module is divided in two parts:

  • allocating/deallocating MSGs;
  • managing queues of MSGs;

Define Documentation

#define MAXMESSAGES   128

Maximum number of messages.
